resources.string: The function of this app is to allow users to be alerted via Android notification of any time particular Twitch streamers go live.

This app uses a collection of user defined \'rules\' to determine when it should create a notification. Each one of these rules must have the name of the channel you want to be notified of, and can optionally have a filter to match streams names. Each rule also has scheduling options to let you control what times or days you wish to be notified of twitch activity. You can also set global scheduling options by selecting \'Global schedule\' from the action bar.
